comments: a(n)-3 is the maximal size of a regular triangulation of a prism over a regular n-gon.Solution to a postage stamp problem with 2 denominations.This sequence is half the degree of the denominator of a certain sequence of rational polynomials defined in the referenced paper by G. Alkauskas. Although this fact is not documented in the paper it can be verified by running the author's code at http://www.alkauskas.puslapiai.lt/MP3/gkw.txt and evaluating degree(denom(...)). - _Stephen Crowley_, Sep 18 2011
